summary: Antoine has what every young single man could wish: a promising career, true and loyal friends, and an apartment of his own. However, he's a lonely man, until he meets Clara, a beautiful ... See full summary »
cast: Julien Boisselier|Julie Gayet|Michel Aumont|Sacha Bourdo|Antoine Duléry|Pascale Arbillot|Sophie Mounicot|Riton Liebman|Frédéric Pierrot|Christian Charmetant|Marianne Viard|Cyril Bedel|Marie-Laure Copie|Anne Didier|Marc Prin|Romain Rondeau|Vincent Colombe|Vincent Dutel|Sophie de Vézières|Gaëlle Nayt|Guillaume Husson|Alexandra Martinez|Martine Diotalevi|Brice Fournier|Marie Paquim
title: Clara et moi
